se.wizard.laststand.engine

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.wizard.laststand.engine.WorldObject
      • se.wizard.laststand.engine.Projectile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UnitImpacter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FireBallProjectile, ShockwaveBlast

    public abstract class Projectile
extends WorldObject
implements UnitImpacter
    A Projectile is a WorldObject that travels in a straight line towards and through its' target position. The Projectile will hit any Unit that isn't its' caster. Upon impact it will disappear.
    Author:
    David Masko

    • Constructor Detail

      • Projectile

        public Projectile(WorldObject caster,
          double radius,
          double xTarget,
          double yTarget,
          double speed)
        Creates a Projectile at its' caster's position. The Projectile files in a straight line with the given speed. The Projectile doesn't stop at the target position. The target position is only used to get the angle the Projectile should travel.
        Parameters:
        caster - The source of the Projectile.
        radius - The radius of the Projectile's circular shape.
        xTarget - The x-position it is aimed towards .
        yTarget - The y-position it is aimed towards.
        speed - The speed it flies with.

    • Method Detail

      • onTick

        public void onTick()
        Description copied from class: WorldObject
        Defines the change of state of the object every game tick. This generally includes movement. Collision detection should not be done here.
        Specified by:
        onTick in class WorldObject

      • getCaster

        public WorldObject getCaster()
        The caster of this Projectile.
